document.full_text: the california man who kidnapped 11-year-old jaycee lee dugard in 1991 and held her captive for 18 years faces life behind bars when he is sentenced on thursday.
document.title: dugard kidnapper faces life in prison at sentencing
lines_and_colors: the california man who kidnapped 11-year-old jaycee lee dugard in 1991 and held her captive for 18 years faces life behind bars when he is sentenced on thursday.
